landing.heading: The Future of Solar Lighting
landing.description: Our dedication to solar lighting solutions is leading the way to a cleaner, healthier world. Join us in advancing toward a future where solar-powered lights revolutionize the way we illuminate our lives and environments.

about.heading: About us
about.paragraph: Spica Solar Lighting is a premier manufacturer of high-quality solar-powered luminaires. We provide robust, reliable solar lighting solutions using top-quality components. Our products are designed for 8-10 years of operation and come with a 5-10 year warranty. They perform excellently in extreme temperatures, from -40°C in Russia to 70°C in the Middle East. Our solar modules can retrofit existing street lighting poles and are suitable for traffic signals and camera poles.

landing.heading: About Spica Solar Lighting
landing.paragraph: Spica Solar Lighting is a leading manufacturer and supplier of high-quality Solar powered lighting luminaires. We dedicated to the design, production, and Supply of High-Quality outdoor solar street lighting, solar landscape lighting, and solar integrated poles. the superior quality by outstanding industrial design ability and innovative, concise design principle.

work-descreption.heading: Committed to a sustainable future
work-descreption.paragraph-1: we don’t compromise quality; we are committed to offering high-quality Solar lighting that will be for its cost.
work-descreption.paragraph-2: We designed and built our products to meet ten years of operation, and it comes with five to ten years of warranty, whether it is minus 40 degrees in Russia or up to 70 degrees in Dubai, Saudi, or Kuwait, our luminaires will work and perform excellently.
